  • Method Details

    • insertLSB

      public void insertLSB​(java.io.File fileCarrier, java.io.File filesToHide)
      Insert any file with extension made of 3 characters into the least significant bits of a BMP image file.

      Parameters:
      fileCarrier - BMP image file
      filesToHide - any file with extension made of 3 characters

    • extractLSB

      public int extractLSB​(java.io.File fileCarrier)
      Extract information from the least significant bits of the BMP image carrier.

      Parameters:
      fileCarrier - BMP image file
      Returns:
      int value based on if the extraction was successful or not

    • isEnoughSpace

      public boolean isEnoughSpace​(java.io.File file, java.util.List<java.io.File> filesToHide)
      Calculate if it is possible to hide chosen data inside a carrier.

      availableSpace = (carrierFileSize - BMP_header - Custom_header) / 8

      Parameters:
      file - image file used as a data carrier
      filesToHide - files chosen by user for LSB insertion
      Returns:
      boolean value based on if it is possible to hide chosen data inside the provided carrier

    • isCarrierSupported

      public boolean isCarrierSupported​(java.io.File file)
      Validate if chosen carrier is supported. Image files with less than 8bits per pixel are not supported.

      Parameters:
      file - image file used as a data carrier
      Returns:
      boolean value based on if the provided file is supported

    • textFileShortening

      public java.util.List<java.io.File> textFileShortening​(java.util.List<java.io.File> filesToHide)
      Iterates over a list of files and shortens present text file with synonym dictionary.

      Parameters:
      filesToHide - list of files with one or more text files
      Returns:
      list of files with shorten text files

    • isTextFilePresent

      public boolean isTextFilePresent​(java.util.List<java.io.File> filesToHide)
      Determine if a text file is present in the list of chosen files.

      Parameters:
      filesToHide - files chosen by user for LSB insertion
      Returns:
      boolean value based on if a text file is present

    • areMoreFilesSelected

      public boolean areMoreFilesSelected​(java.util.List<java.io.File> filesToHide)
      Determine if more than one file was chosen.

      Parameters:
      filesToHide - files chosen by user for LSB insertion
      Returns:
      boolean value based on if more files were selected
